General.Name: XTC New Energy Materials Xiamen Co Ltd
General.Description: XTC New Energy Materials(Xiamen) Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of lithium-ion battery cathode materials in China and internationally. It offers high-voltage lithium cobaltate, high-voltage ternary materials, high-power ternary materials, high-nickel ternary materials, hydrogen energy materials, sodium battery cathode materials, and phosphate based materials, etc. used for new energy vehicles, 3C consumer electronics, energy storage, and other applications. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Xiamen, China. XTC New Energy Materials(Xiamen) Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xiamen Tungsten Co., Ltd.
General.Address: One of No. 300 Kejingshe, Xiamen, China, 361026
